thread.title: Shake Shack Is Testing Caviar Delivery
thread.title_full: Shake Shack Is Testing Caviar Delivery

author: Stefanie Tuder
title: Shake Shack Is Testing Caviar Delivery
text:
Get it while you can this weekend
The lines at New York City burger king Shake Shack have certainly lessened since its origins in Madison Square Park, but with delivery options few , you usually need to get off your couch to get it, with the exception of this weekend: Caviar has teamed up with the Shack to offer delivery.
Caviar Shake Shack delivery times From Friday, March 24 through Sunday, March 26, there will be zero delivery fees on the entire menu (and no jacked-up prices), so that means all the burgers, fried chicken sandwiches, hot dogs, fries, and shakes you can handle at home. Six Manhattan locations and two in Brooklyn are participating (DUMBO, Flatbush Avenue, Madison Square Park, Battery Park City, Upper East Side, Midtown East, Upper West Side, and the Theater District); take a look at the full schedule to the right.
While for now delivery is limited to just this weekend, and Caviar refers to it as a “pop-up,” one can only hope that Shake Shack hasn’t ruled out the possibility of continuing the promotion — and delivery.
